channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- DW Promobar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- DW Promobar

item.title: CVE-2022-2423|2024-08-03T00:39:07.417Z -- unknown -- dw%20promobar
item.description: The DW Promobar WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
